name: QuestBit
description: Gamified task management application where users compete for a spot on the leaderboard with friends to complete Quests and their QuestBits.

name: KitchenHelper
description: Web application to keep track of user's ingredients and recipes, offering recipes based on inventory.

name: FitHub
description: Sport center management web application to allow owners, instructors, and users to organize courses.

name: AssetPlus
description: Hotel asset management desktop application to allow hotel owners, employees, and guests to track assets.

name: Archer.io
description: Educational desktop bow and arrow game in which users aim for a target on different planets and learn about the mechanics behind the arrow's trajectory.

name: Spawk
description: Hackathon project to match pets to potential owners.
